name: SNS messages failing to deliver for {{topicname.name}} - DD example
message:
SNS topic {{topicname.name}} in AWS account {{aws_account.name}} has high number of failed deliveries. Currently {{value}} undelivered messages in the topic.
Please take a closer look at the topic in [AWS console](https://us-east-2.console.aws.amazon.com/sns/v3/home?region={{region.name}}#/topics)
